text: flma ja'at malika "sba" 'iilaa sulayman fi mjlsh qil lha: ahkdha ershk? qalt: 'iinah yshbhh. fzhr lisulayman 'anaha 'asabat fi jwabha, waqad ealimt qudrat allah wsht nbwt sulayman ealayh alslam, fqal: wa'uwtina aleilm biallah wbqdrth min qblha, wakunaa mnqadyn li'amr allah mtbeyn ldyn alaslam
